alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 30 at 3:20AM EDT until October 30 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to 5 inches, sleet accumulations up to one tenth of an inch, and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Central Somerset and Northern Franklin Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Snow is expected to result in slippery travel on untreated roads and reduced visibility for the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall accumulations are expected to be elevation-dependent with higher totals expected across mountain ranges and peaks.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
